author: @wkyt
title: Winter Storm Watch issued January 2 at 3:16PM EST until January 6 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Louisville KY
text:
Updated: 33 minutes ago
Guillermo Hernandez-Noyola is wanted for his involvement in a home invasion and robbery that happened on Keystone Drive in April of 2024.
Updated: 33 minutes ago
The name of the person killed in a crash in Lexington has been released.
Updated: 33 minutes ago
We are learning more about the two men who died while digging for coal last week.
Updated: 1 hour ago
It happened on the Bluegrass Parkway in Nelson County.
Updated: 2 hours ago
A man has learned his sentence in a Lexington homicide case.
